attributes.action: Shut all UK schools on December 11th 2020 for Christmas Holidays.
attributes.additional_details: Shut all UK schools on December 11th to allow a period of isolation before Christmas. Allow families to relax and enjoy the festive period without the stress and worry. Families need this time more than ever
attributes.background: To ensure any isolation periods or anyone symptomatic to isolate before Christmas. Allow families to enjoy Christmas following a turbulent year.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549015
